metadata.og:title: Interf - The Interface for Agentic Self-Onboarding
metadata.og:description: Interf provides the open protocol and runtime infrastructure to decouple Agent Capabilities from Enterprise Implementation. We solve the FDE crisis by treating Onboarding-as-Code.
metadata.twitter:title: Interf - The Interface for Agentic Self-Onboarding
metadata.twitter:description: Interf provides the open protocol and runtime infrastructure to decouple Agent Capabilities from Enterprise Implementation. We solve the FDE crisis by treating Onboarding-as-Code.
